bug.author: raver119
bug.description: When building stack using maven, MKLDNN support should be properly handling by javacpp: HAVE_MKLDNN should be propagated down to both libnd4j and JNI bindings equally, to avoid stack/heap corruption caused by binary disparity.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
